column2: "Oh! Ooooh! If it isn't my dearest <%me>!!"
"I'm not with that training maniac today. Actually, we're competing!"
"Dual Blades vs Jet Boots! A sort of weapons perfomance test, if you will."
"The loser has to do whatever single thing the winner says, so I can't afford to lose!"
"Of course, me versus Saga is hardly a fair fight. I'm at the disadvantage here!"
"So why take the challenge at all? Simple! I want to win!"
"Naturally, it's about a 99.9% chance I'll lose, but... my odds of winning aren't zero!"
"Once he gets absorbed in training, maybe Saga will get bored and cut out! Or maybe he'll oversleep and show up late!"
"All it takes is a little slip-up and I'll come out ahead!"
"If I never take a chance, I'll never be able to look down on him in triumph! I can't let the possibility slip by!"
"One day, I'll leave that tin man speechless!"
"I swear it on my pride!! ...Teehee, be sure to stay tuned!"
"--Ah!! Oh no! The longer I talk, the wider the gap in our scores becomes!"
"Parting with you is such sweet sorrow, but our conversation will have to wait!"
"Oh yes!! If you happen to run into Saga please slow him down! Thanks, dearie!!"
